title: Devise 20 questions corresponding to exercise 4A and 20 questions correspondi...

parts:
Devise 20 questions corresponding to exercise 4A and 20 questions corresponding to exercise 4B in the attached PDF file. Requirements:
- Multipart questions are allowed. Each multipart question counts as ONE question
- Difficulty level: Easy to Middle Level. Target audience is Secondary 1 pupils in Singapore
- Stick to the same questioning style and pedagogy as the questions in the PDF file
- Try to cover the full range of questions, so that your 40 questions are collectively representative of the question sets in Exercises 4A and 4B.
- Stick to the terminology in the PDF file. Do not include mathematical terms not used in the PDF file.
- Include very concise answers.

## Exercise 4A — 20 questions (Easy to Middle) + very concise answers

### 1. Write down an algebraic expression for each of the following statements.
(a) Add \(7y\) to the product of \(a\) and \(b\).  
(b) Subtract 5 from the square of \(n\).  
(c) Multiply \(k\) by \(4m\).  
(d) Divide \(3ab\) by \(6c\).  
(e) Subtract 2 times the **positive square root** of \(y\) from 9.  
(f) Twice the variable \(p\) divided by the product of 2 and \(q\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(ab+7y\)  
(b) \(n^2-5\)  
(c) \(4mk\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{ab}{2c}\)  
(e) \(9-2\sqrt{y}\)  
(f) \(\dfrac{p}{q}\)

---

### 2. Given that \(x=4\) and \(y=-3\), evaluate each of the following expressions.
(a) \(2x-5y\)  
(b) \(3x+y^2\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{2y}{x}\)  
(d) \(x^2-xy\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(23\)  
(b) \(21\)  
(c) \(-\dfrac{3}{2}\)  
(d) \(28\)

---

### 3. Simplify the following.
(a) \((-9x)+(-4x)\)  
(b) \((-2y)+(-11y)\)  
(c) \((-6a)+(-a)\)  
(d) \((-8)+(-5)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-13x\)  
(b) \(-13y\)  
(c) \(-7a\)  
(d) \(-13\)

---

### 4. Simplify the following.
(a) \(7p+(-3p)\)  
(b) \(-5m+9m\)  
(c) \(-12+7\)  
(d) \(8+(-13)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(4p\)  
(b) \(4m\)  
(c) \(-5\)  
(d) \(-5\)

---

### 5. Simplify the following.
(a) \(15x-6x\)  
(b) \(4a-11a\)  
(c) \(-9y-2y\)  
(d) \(3p-8p\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(9x\)  
(b) \(-7a\)  
(c) \(-11y\)  
(d) \(-5p\)

---

### 6. Simplify the following.
(a) \(6x-(-5x)\)  
(b) \(-7y-(-2y)\)  
(c) \(-5a-(-12a)\)  
(d) \(9m-(-m)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(11x\)  
(b) \(-5y\)  
(c) \(7a\)  
(d) \(10m\)

---

### 7. Simplify the following.
(a) \(4x+7x-2x\)  
(b) \(5y-3y+y\)  
(c) \(-2a-6a+9a\)  
(d) \(-8p+3p-5p\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(9x\)  
(b) \(3y\)  
(c) \(a\)  
(d) \(-10p\)

---

### 8. Simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(3x+5y-x+2y\)  
(b) \(-4a+7b+2a-3b\)  
(c) \(6m-2n+3n-4m\)  
(d) \(-5x-2y+3x+y\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x+7y\)  
(b) \(-2a+4b\)  
(c) \(2m+n\)  
(d) \(-2x-y\)

---

### 9. Simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(5x+12-3x-7\)  
(b) \(9y-4+2y+10\)  
(c) \(-6a+3-2a-8\)  
(d) \(4m-9-7m+2\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x+5\)  
(b) \(11y+6\)  
(c) \(-8a-5\)  
(d) \(-3m-7\)

---

### 10. Find the sum of each of the following pairs of expressions.
(a) \(3x-5\) and \(2x+7\)  
(b) \(-4y\) and \(9-y\)  
(c) \(6a-2b\) and \(-3a+5b\)  
(d) \(p+q\) and \(p-q\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(5x+2\)  
(b) \(9-5y\)  
(c) \(3a+3b\)  
(d) \(2p\)

---

### 11. Write down an algebraic expression for each of the following statements.
(a) Subtract the cube root of \(h\) from the square of \(k\).  
(b) The total value of \(n\) 50-cent coins and \(m\) 20-cent coins in cents.  
(c) Divide the product of \(3a\) and \(b\) by \(2c\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(k^2-\sqrt[3]{h}\)  
(b) \(50n+20m\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{3ab}{2c}\)

---

### 12. Given that \(a=-2\), \(b=5\) and \(c=-1\), evaluate each of the following expressions.
(a) \(3a-2c\)  
(b) \(ab+c^2\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{b+c}{a}\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{a+b}{c}\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-4\)  
(b) \(-9\)  
(c) \(-2\)  
(d) \(-3\)

---

### 13. Simplify each of the following.
(a) \(-84x+(-16x)\)  
(b) \(27y-(-15y)\)  
(c) \(-9a-5a+12a\)  
(d) \(-34z-(-19z)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-100x\)  
(b) \(42y\)  
(c) \(-2a\)  
(d) \(-15z\)

---

### 14.
(i) Simplify \(2p+(-q)-3p-(-4q)+5\).  
(ii) Find its value when \(p=-2\) and \(q=3\).

**Ans:**  
(i) \(3q-p+5\)  
(ii) \(16\)

---

### 15. Ahmad bought 5 storybooks at \(\$x\) each and 3 rulers at \(\$y\) each. He had \(\$(2x+y)\) left. Find the amount of money he had at first.

**Ans:** \(7x+4y\)

---

### 16. Mr Lee is \(10p\) years old. His daughter was born when he was \(6p\) years old. Find an expression in \(p\) for  
(i) his daughter’s age now,  
(ii) the sum of their ages, in 4 years’ time.

**Ans:**  
(i) \(4p\)  
(ii) \(14p+8\)

---

### 17. At a stall, for every 3 people who order chicken rice, there are 4 people who order fishball noodles.
(a) If \(a\) people order chicken rice, how many people order fishball noodles?  
(b) If \(b\) people order fishball noodles, how many people order chicken rice?  
(c) If there are a total of \(c\) people, how many people order chicken rice?

**Ans:**  
(a) \(\dfrac{4a}{3}\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{3b}{4}\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{3c}{7}\)

---

### 18. A collection of coins contains only 20-cent and 5-cent coins. There are \(x\) 5-cent coins.
(a) Find an expression for the total value of the 5-cent coins in cents.  
(b) If there are twice as many 20-cent coins as 5-cent coins, find an expression for the total value in cents.  
(c) If there are 3 fewer 20-cent coins than 5-cent coins, find an expression for the total value in cents.

**Ans:**  
(a) \(5x\)  
(b) \(45x\)  
(c) \(25x-60\)

---

### 19. Simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(2x+3y+x-y\)  
(b) \(4a+5b-a+2\)  
(c) \(7m+3n-2m-5n\)  
(d) \(6x+4-2y+5x\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(3x+2y\)  
(b) \(3a+5b+2\)  
(c) \(5m-2n\)  
(d) \(11x-2y+4\)

---

### 20. Find the value of \(p^2+2q^2\) when \(p=-\dfrac{1}{2}\) and \(q=3\).

**Ans:** \(\dfrac{73}{4}\)

---

---

## Exercise 4B — 20 questions (Easy to Middle) + very concise answers

### 1. Expand each of the following expressions.
(a) \(-(x+6)\)  
(b) \(-3(y-4)\)  
(c) \(2(3a-5)\)  
(d) \(5(2m+n)\)  
(e) \(-4(2p-3q)\)  
(f) \(7(x-2y)\)  
(g) \(8-2(3w-5)\)  
(h) \(13+3c(-y-2z)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-x-6\)  
(b) \(-3y+12\)  
(c) \(6a-10\)  
(d) \(10m+5n\)  
(e) \(-8p+12q\)  
(f) \(7x-14y\)  
(g) \(18-6w\)  
(h) \(13-3cy-6cz\)

---

### 2. Nadia is \(y\) years old. Her father is now three times as old as Nadia will be in 2 years’ time. Find an expression for her father’s age now.

**Ans:** \(3(y+2)=3y+6\)

---

### 3. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(4(a+3b)-2b\)  
(b) \(6(p-q)+3(2q+p)\)  
(c) \(x+2(3x-5)\)  
(d) \(2y-5(1-y)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(4a+10b\)  
(b) \(9p\)  
(c) \(7x-10\)  
(d) \(7y-5\)

---

### 4. A mango costs \(x\) cents. A pear costs 30 cents less than a mango. Find an expression for  
(i) the cost of a pear,  
(ii) the cost of 3 mangoes and 5 pears.

**Ans:**  
(i) \(x-30\)  
(ii) \(8x-150\)

---

### 5. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(4x-3(2x-5)\)  
(b) \(-2a-3(a-4)\)  
(c) \(7m-2(3m-2n)\)  
(d) \(5(2x+y)-3(x-2y)\)  
(e) \(-4(p-3q)-5(p+q)\)  
(f) \(2(3r-2)-(r+5)\)  
(g) \(x+y-2(3x-y+4)\)  
(h) \(3(p-2q)-4(2p-3q-1)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2x+15\)  
(b) \(-5a+12\)  
(c) \(m+4n\)  
(d) \(7x+11y\)  
(e) \(-9p+7q\)  
(f) \(5r-9\)  
(g) \(-5x+3y-8\)  
(h) \(-5p+6q+4\)

---

### 6. Subtract
(a) \(5x-2\) from \(3x+7\),  
(b) \(-4y+3\) from \(2y-5\),  
(c) \(2a-b\) from \(5a+3b\),  
(d) \(3-2m\) from \(4m+1\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2x+9\)  
(b) \(6y-8\)  
(c) \(3a+4b\)  
(d) \(6m-2\)

---

### 7. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(-2[3x-4(x-1)]\)  
(b) \(5\bigl(2a-[a-3(a+2)]\bigr)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x-8\)  
(b) \(20a+30\)

---

### 8. Subtract
(a) \(12x-5\) from the sum of \(4x+7\) and \(3x-2\),  
(b) \(6w^2-w+2\) from the product of \(-2\) and \((3w^2+4w-1)\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-5x+10\)  
(b) \(-12w^2-7w\)

---

### 9. Expand each of the following expressions.
(a) \(3(x+2y-1)\)  
(b) \(-(2a-5b+4)\)  
(c) \(-5(1-2m)\)  
(d) \(2(p-3q+2)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(3x+6y-3\)  
(b) \(-2a+5b-4\)  
(c) \(10m-5\)  
(d) \(2p-6q+4\)

---

### 10. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(2(x-3)+3(x+1)\)  
(b) \(5(a-2b)-2(2a+b)\)  
(c) \((3y-4)-2(y+5)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(5x-3\)  
(b) \(a-12b\)  
(c) \(y-14\)

---

### 11. Subtract
(a) \(3x^2-2x+1\) from \(5x^2+x-4\),  
(b) \(7y^2-5y\) from the sum of \(2y^2+y+6\) and \(3y^2-4y-1\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x^2+3x-5\)  
(b) \(-2y^2+2y+5\)

---

### 12. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(4-2[3-(x-1)]\)  
(b) \(3[2y+1-(y-4)]\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x-4\)  
(b) \(3y+15\)

---

### 13. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(6(x-2)-2(2x+5)\)  
(b) \(-3(2a-b)+4(a+2b)\)  
(c) \(2(3m-n)-(m+4n)\)  
(d) \(7-3(2p-1)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x-22\)  
(b) \(-2a+11b\)  
(c) \(5m-6n\)  
(d) \(10-6p\)

---

### 14. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \((x+4)-(2x-3)\)  
(b) \(2(a-3)-(a+5)\)  
(c) \(-[3y-(2y-1)]\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-x+7\)  
(b) \(a-11\)  
(c) \(-y-1\)

---

### 15. Expand and simplify \(5-2[4-3(x+1)]\).

**Ans:** \(6x+3\)

---

### 16. Expand and simplify \(-(x-2y+3)+2(y-4)\).

**Ans:** \(-x+4y-11\)

---

### 17. Expand and simplify \(4(x+1)-(2x-3)\).

**Ans:** \(2x+7\)

---

### 18. Expand and simplify \((x-3)-2(2x+1)\).

**Ans:** \(-3x-5\)

---

### 19. Expand and simplify \(3(a+b)+2(a-b)-(a+4b)\).

**Ans:** \(4a-3b\)

---

### 20. Subtract \(5y-2\) from the product of 3 and \((2y+1)\).

**Ans:** \(y+5\)

Now devise 20 hard questions corresponding to Exercise 4A and 20 hard quetsions corresponding to Exercise 4B.

- Multipart questions are allowed. Each multipart question counts as ONE question
- Difficulty level: Hard. Target audience is Secondary 1 pupils in Singapore
- Stick to the same questioning style and pedagogy as the questions in the PDF file
- Try to cover the full range of questions, so that your 40 questions are collectively representative of the question sets in Exercises 4A and 4B.
- Stick to the terminology in the PDF file. Do not include mathematical terms not used in the PDF file.
- Include very concise answers.

## Exercise 4A (Hard) — 20 questions + very concise answers

### 1. Write down an algebraic expression for each of the following statements.
(a) Subtract 6 times the positive square root of \(z\) from twice the cube of \(x\).  
(b) Divide the product of \(15a\) and \(b\) by \(6c\).  
(c) Subtract the cube root of \(t\) from the square of \((p-q)\).  
(d) Twice the variable \(m\) divided by the product of 3 and \(n\).  
(e) The total value of \(x\) 50-cent coins and \(y\) 2-dollar notes in cents.

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x^3-6\sqrt{z}\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{5ab}{2c}\)  
(c) \((p-q)^2-\sqrt[3]{t}\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{2m}{3n}\)  
(e) \(50x+200y\)

---

### 2. Given that \(x=-3\) and \(y=-2\), evaluate each of the following expressions.
(a) \(4x-7y\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{5x}{2y}+x\)  
(c) \(3x^2-2y^3\)  
(d) \(2x+\dfrac{x}{y}-y^2\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{3}{4}\)  
(c) \(43\)  
(d) \(-\dfrac{17}{2}\)

---

### 3. Given that \(a=-4\), \(b=2\) and \(c=-3\), evaluate each of the following expressions.
(a) \(a(2c-3b)\)  
(b) \(ab^2+ac\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{b}{a}-\dfrac{c}{b}\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{a+b}{c}+\dfrac{b+c}{a}\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(48\)  
(b) \(-4\)  
(c) \(1\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{11}{12}\)

---

### 4. Simplify the following.
(a) \(-8x-(-5x)+(-13x)\)  
(b) \(6y-(-4y)-(-9y)\)  
(c) \(-11a+(-7a)-(-3a)+5a\)  
(d) \(-3p-(-2p)-7p+(-p)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-16x\)  
(b) \(19y\)  
(c) \(-10a\)  
(d) \(-9p\)

---

### 5. Simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(5x+18-2x-7-4x+3\)  
(b) \(-3y-4+9y+2-7y+11\)  
(c) \(6xy+4x-9yx-5x+2xy+7\)  
(d) \(12m-8n+5m+2n-3m-7n+9\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(14-x\)  
(b) \(9-y\)  
(c) \(7-x-xy\)  
(d) \(14m-13n+9\)

---

### 6. Find the sum of each of the following pairs of expressions.
(a) \(3x-5y+7\) and \(-8x+2y-9\)  
(b) \(-4a+7b-3\) and \(9a-5b+11\)  
(c) \(6pq-4hk+2kh\) and \(-3qp+7hk-5kh\)  
(d) \(-2c+5d-8\) and \(9c-3d+6\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-5x-3y-2\)  
(b) \(5a+2b+8\)  
(c) \(3pq\)  
(d) \(7c+2d-2\)

---

### 7. Simplify the following.
(a) \(-15x-(-9x)-(-4x)\)  
(b) \(8y-(-3y)+(-11y)-(-2y)\)  
(c) \(-7z-(-14z)-6z-(-z)\)  
(d) \(5a-(-2a)-(-8a)-3a\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2x\)  
(b) \(2y\)  
(c) \(2z\)  
(d) \(12a\)

---

### 8.
(i) Simplify \(4p+(-3q)-5r-(-7p)+2q-(-r)-9\).  
(ii) Find its value when \(p=-1\), \(q=2\) and \(r=-3\).

**Ans:**  
(i) \(11p-q-4r-9\)  
(ii) \(-10\)

---

### 9. A collection of coins contains only 10-cent and 50-cent coins. There are \(x\) 10-cent coins. The number of 50-cent coins is \((3x-4)\). Find an expression for the total value in cents.

**Ans:** \(160x-200\)

---

### 10. Siti bought 6 muffins at \(\$x\) each and 2 drinks at \(\$y\) each. She had \(\$(3x-y)\) left. Find the amount of money she had at first.

**Ans:** \(9x+y\)

---

### 11. A father is \(5m\) years old. His son was born when the father was \((2m+3)\) years old. Find an expression in \(m\) for  
(i) the son’s age now,  
(ii) the sum of their ages, in 6 years’ time.

**Ans:**  
(i) \(3m-3\)  
(ii) \(8m+9\)

---

### 12. At a fruit stall, for every 4 apples sold, there are 7 oranges sold.
(a) If \(a\) apples are sold, how many oranges are sold?  
(b) If \(b\) oranges are sold, how many apples are sold?  
(c) If there are a total of \(c\) fruits sold, how many are apples?

**Ans:**  
(a) \(\dfrac{7a}{4}\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{4b}{7}\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{4c}{11}\)

---

### 13. Simplify each of the following.
(a) \(-126x+(-38x)+79x\)  
(b) \(45y-18y-(-27y)\)  
(c) \(-64a-(-25a)+(-11a)-9a\)  
(d) \(-93z-(-17z)-(-40z)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-85x\)  
(b) \(54y\)  
(c) \(-59a\)  
(d) \(-36z\)

---

### 14. Simplify each of the following.
(a) \(-205x-(-78x)\)  
(b) \(-144y+(-66y)\)  
(c) \(57x+(-121x)+(-8x)\)  
(d) \(-39k-(-52k)+(-13k)\)  
(e) \(-5p-(-3p)-(-2p)-9p\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-127x\)  
(b) \(-210y\)  
(c) \(-72x\)  
(d) \(0\)  
(e) \(-9p\)

---

### 15. Simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(14xy+(-9yx)-3xy\)  
(b) \(6ab+(-4ba)+(-7ab)-(-2ab)\)  
(c) \(-5mn-(-3nm)-12mn\)  
(d) \(8pq-3qp+(-6pq)+10\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2xy\)  
(b) \(-3ab\)  
(c) \(-14mn\)  
(d) \(10-pq\)

---

### 16.
(i) Simplify \(5a+(-2b)-(-7a)+(-6b)-9\).  
(ii) Find the value when \(a=-2\) and \(b=3\).

**Ans:**  
(i) \(12a-8b-9\)  
(ii) \(-57\)

---

### 17. Find the sum of each of the following pairs of expressions.
(a) \(4x-3y-5\) and \(-9x+7y+11\)  
(b) \(2a-5b+3\) and \(-4a+9b-10\)  
(c) \(5hk-3kh+2\) and \(-7hk+9kh-6\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-5x+4y+6\)  
(b) \(-2a+4b-7\)  
(c) \(4hk-4\)

---

### 18. Write down an algebraic expression for each of the following statements.
(a) Subtract the cube root of the product of \(2m\) and \(n\) from \(y^2\).  
(b) Add 3 times the positive square root of \(p\) to \(\dfrac{2x}{5y}\).  
(c) Divide the product of \(6a\) and \(b\) by the product of \(4c\) and \(d\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(y^2-\sqrt[3]{2mn}\)  
(b) \(\dfrac{2x}{5y}+3\sqrt{p}\)  
(c) \(\dfrac{3ab}{2cd}\)

---

### 19. Given that \(p=3\), \(q=-2\) and \(r=-1\), evaluate each of the following expressions.
(a) \(5p+(-2q)-7r\)  
(b) \(3p-(-4q)+2r-q\)  
(c) \(p^2+3q^2\)  
(d) \(2p+\dfrac{p}{q}-q^2\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(26\)  
(b) \(1\)  
(c) \(21\)  
(d) \(\dfrac{1}{2}\)

---

### 20. Simplify each of the following.
(a) \(-7x+5y-(-3x)+(-8y)-4x+12\)  
(b) \(6m-9n-(-4m)+(-2n)-7m+3n\)  
(c) \(-5ab+8ba-3ab-(-4ba)\)  
(d) \(9+(-2p)-3q-(-7p)+5q-14\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(12-8x-3y\)  
(b) \(3m-8n\)  
(c) \(4ab\)  
(d) \(5p+2q-5\)

---

---

## Exercise 4B (Hard) — 20 questions + very concise answers

### 1. Expand each of the following expressions.
(a) \(-(2x-5)\)  
(b) \(-(3-4y)\)  
(c) \(4(2a-3b+1)\)  
(d) \(-5(x-2y+4)\)  
(e) \(3a(2x-y)\)  
(f) \(-2m(3n-5)\)  
(g) \(7-4(2w-3x+1)\)  
(h) \(15+2c(-3y+4z-1)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2x+5\)  
(b) \(4y-3\)  
(c) \(8a-12b+4\)  
(d) \(-5x+10y-20\)  
(e) \(6ax-3ay\)  
(f) \(-6mn+10m\)  
(g) \(12x-8w+3\)  
(h) \(15-6cy+8cz-2c\)

---

### 2. Kumar is \(x\) years old. Kumar’s uncle is now 2 years younger than four times as old as Kumar will be in 5 years’ time. Find an expression for the age of Kumar’s uncle now.

**Ans:** \(4(x+5)-2=4x+18\)

---

### 3. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(6(a-2b)-4(2a+b-3)\)  
(b) \(3(2x-y+4)-2(5x+3y-1)\)  
(c) \(x+4(3x-2y+1)-2(2x+y-5)\)  
(d) \(7(p-2q)-3[\,2p-(q-4)\,]\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2a-16b+12\)  
(b) \(-4x-9y+14\)  
(c) \(9x-10y+14\)  
(d) \(p-11q-12\)

---

### 4. A pear costs \(x\) cents. An orange costs \((y+20)\) cents less than a pear. Find an expression for  
(i) the cost of an orange,  
(ii) the cost of 3 pears and 10 oranges.

**Ans:**  
(i) \(x-y-20\)  
(ii) \(13x-10y-200\)

---

### 5. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(8u-5(3u-2v)\)  
(b) \(-4a-3(a-2b+1)\)  
(c) \(7m-2n-3(2m-5n+4)\)  
(d) \(5(2x-y)-4(-x+3y-2)\)  
(e) \(-3(p-4q)-2(5p+q-1)\)  
(f) \(2(3r-2)-[\,4-(r+5)\,]\)  
(g) \(x+y-3(2x-4y+1)+2(x-y-5)\)  
(h) \(6(p-2q)-3[\,2p-(3q-4)\,]\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-7u+10v\)  
(b) \(-7a+6b-3\)  
(c) \(m+13n-12\)  
(d) \(14x-17y+8\)  
(e) \(-13p+10q+2\)  
(f) \(7r-3\)  
(g) \(-3x+11y-13\)  
(h) \(-3q-12\)

---

### 6. Subtract
(a) \(7x-5\) from \(-3x+2y+11\),  
(b) \(4a-3b+2c\) from \(-2a+5b-c+7\),  
(c) \(-6p+2q-5\) from \(3p-7q+4\),  
(d) \(4x-3y+2z\) from \(-2x+5y-7z\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-10x+2y+16\)  
(b) \(-6a+8b-3c+7\)  
(c) \(9p-9q+9\)  
(d) \(-6x+8y-9z\)

---

### 7. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(-2[\,3x-5(x-(2-x))\,]\)  
(b) \(4[\,2a-(3-(a-5))\,]-3[\,a-(2a-1)\,]\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(14x-20\)  
(b) \(15a-35\)

---

### 8. Subtract
(a) \(9x^2-5x+12\) from the sum of \(4x^2+3x-1\) and \(7x^2-2x+6\),  
(b) \(5w^2+4w-3\) from the product of \(-3\) and \((2w^2-w+5)\).

**Ans:**  
(a) \(2x^2+6x-7\)  
(b) \(-11w^2-w-12\)

---

### 9. Expand and simplify \(3(x+2y)-(2x-y-5)-2(x-3y+4)\).

**Ans:** \(13y-x-3\)

---

### 10. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(2(3x-4)+5(x+2)\)  
(b) \(7-2[\,3-(2x-5)\,]\)  
(c) \(-(x-3)-4(2-x)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(11x+2\)  
(b) \(4x-9\)  
(c) \(3x-5\)

---

### 11. Siti is \(x\) years old. Her mother is now two times as old as Siti will be in 6 years’ time. Find an expression for  
(i) her mother’s age now,  
(ii) the sum of their ages 3 years ago.

**Ans:**  
(i) \(2x+12\)  
(ii) \(3x+6\)

---

### 12. A notebook costs \(x\) cents. A marker costs \(3x\) cents. A file costs \(y\) cents less than a notebook. Find an expression for the cost of 2 markers and 5 files.

**Ans:** \(11x-5y\)

---

### 13. Expand and simplify each of the following expressions.
(a) \(3a(2x-y)-2x(4a-1)\)  
(b) \(-2m(3n-4)+5n(m-2)\)  
(c) \((p+q)-3(p-q)+2(q-p)\)

**Ans:**  
(a) \(-2ax-3ay+2x\)  
(b) \(-mn+8m-10n\)  
(c) \(6q-4p\)

---

### 14. Expand and simplify \(2[\,3-2(x-1)\,]-5[\,1-(x-4)\,]\).

**Ans:** \(x-15\)

---

### 15. Expand and simplify \(-(2x-(3-y))+3(y-(x-2))\).

**Ans:** \(2y-5x+9\)

---

### 16. Subtract \(3(2a-b)\) from \(-2(a+3b)+5\). Expand and simplify.

**Ans:** \(-8a-3b+5\)

---

### 17. Expand and simplify \(4-3[\,2-(x-1)\,]+2(x-5)\).

**Ans:** \(5x-15\)

---

### 18. Expand and simplify \((2x-3)-(4-(x+5))+2(3-x)\).

**Ans:** \(x+4\)

---

### 19. Expand and simplify \(5(x-y)-2[\,3x-(2y-1)\,]\).

**Ans:** \(-x-y-2\)

---

### 20. Subtract \(2w^2-3w-4\) from \(-w^2+5w+7\).

**Ans:** \(-3w^2+8w+11\)
